name: poll
signature: <A, E>(self: Deferred<A, E>) => Effect<Option<Effect<A, E, never>>, never, never>
description:
Returns a `Some<Effect<A, E, R>>` from the `Deferred` if this `Deferred` has
already been completed, `None` otherwise.
documentation:
Returns a `Some<Effect<A, E, R>>` from the `Deferred` if this `Deferred` has
already been completed, `None` otherwise.
